title: Swimmy
creator_credit: Giulio Gianini, Leo Lionni and Connecticut Films
brief_description: This prize-winning animated film is Leo Lionni’s own interpretation of his original fable about the small fish, Swimmy, which outwits the hungry tuna and leads the other fish in exploring the marvellous underwater world.
